projects.title: Cottage Bakery Project

projects.title: Camp Registration Project
projects.description: I used this project to practice using forms and making actions occur when they are submitted.

projects.title: Recipe Book Search project

projects.title: The Italian Pineapple
projects.description: This was a group project I did with some friends. We each took a page of the pizza website to create. I made the coupons page.

projects.title: Applet Store
projects.description: I was given the html of a bad version of this website and was tasked with making a professional webpage for the apple treats.
